{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Modou |model=M101 |revision=C |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=28 |est_release_date=06/2014 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=PCB on-board |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=PIFA plug-in |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=LCD, touchscreen |tp_firmware=OpenWrt (14.09) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=modou-xxxx |default_ip=192.168.18.1 |default_user=matrix |default_pass=random 8 digit dispaly on the LCD }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Wireless AC750 Router}} :[http://www.modouwifi.com/router.html?r=1421662619000 Product page] {{•}} [http://www.modouwifi.com/router-specifications.html?r=1421662474000 Specifications]
*[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/any-idea-about-modou-m101c-mt7620a-mt7610en-128mb-nand-flash-128mb-ddr2-2-4-tft-lcd/4253 On '''LEDE Project''' forums]
===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC750 (300 + 433Mbps) * 2.4" TFT-LCD (320 × 240) touchscreen * Ports: : WAN: 1x FE (RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT) : LAN: 2x FE (RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT) : USB: 1x USB 2.0 * Antenna: 3x internal PCB antenna * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5GHz : 2.4GHz 4x Guest network, : 5GHz 4x Guest network * Button: Reset * Power Supply: : AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1A current
===See also=== * [http://www.modouwifi.com/ Modou Wireless AC networking solutions] * http://www.securifi.com/almond
===Images=== * [https://www.flickr.com/photos/130685460@N03/15693594174/in/photostream/ @flickr.com] * [https://www.flickr.com/photos/130685460@N03/16128462068/in/photostream/ @flickr.com]
